statements: SELECT * FROM financial_reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT report_name, transaction_amount FROM financial_reports WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM financial_reports ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT report_name, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM financial_reports WHERE business_unit_id = 3;
SELECT report_id, report_name, created_at FROM financial_reports WHERE transaction_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT report_name, transaction_amount FROM financial_reports WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM financial_reports WHERE transaction_amount < 5000 AND report_name LIKE '%Annual Report%' ORDER BY report_name ASC
SELECT report_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM financial_reports GROUP BY report_id HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT business_unit_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount FROM financial_reports GROUP BY business_unit_id HAVING SUM(transaction_amount) > 10000 ORDER BY average_amount ASC
SELECT report_name, transaction_date FROM financial_reports WHERE DATE(transaction_date) = '2022-01-30' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM financial_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, total_transactions_count FROM financial_reports WHERE total_transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT AVG(total_transaction_amount) AS average_amount FROM financial_reports;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM transactions;
SELECT report_date, total_transactions_count FROM financial_reports WHERE report_date < '2021-06-01' ORDER BY total_transactions_count DESC;
SELECT MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_amount, MIN(transaction_amount) AS min_amount FROM transactions;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date, customer_id FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT report_date, total_amount FROM reports WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, total_amount, customer_id FROM reports WHERE customer_id IN (1001, 1003) ORDER BY total_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3
SELECT report_id, report_date, total_amount FROM reports WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY report_date ASC
SELECT customer_id, name, phone_number FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM transactions JOIN customers ON transactions.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN reports ON transactions.customer_id = reports.customer_id ORDER BY transactions.amount DESC
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT account_id, account_name FROM accounts ORDER BY account_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT report_id, report_name, total_amount FROM reports WHERE date_created > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, destination_account_id FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, a.account_name FROM transactions t JOIN accounts a ON t.source_account_id = a.account_id WHERE t.amount < 500 AND a.account_name LIKE '%Savings%';
SELECT c.customer_name, c.address, r.report_name FROM customers c INNER JOIN reports r ON c.customer_id = r.report_id WHERE c.phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY r.date_created LIMIT 5;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, a.account_name FROM transactions t JOIN accounts a ON t.destination_account_id = a.account_id WHERE a.account_name IN ('Checking Account', 'Savings Account') ORDER BY t.amount DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT account_name, account_type FROM accounts ORDER BY account_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT report_name, report_date, total_amount FROM reports WHERE total_amount < 5000 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, account_id FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%' AND customer_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT report_name, total_amount FROM reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT t.*, tl.log_timestamp FROM transactions t INNER JOIN transactions_log tl ON t.transaction_id = tl.transaction_id WHERE tl.log_type = 'error';
